General.Name: Visiativ
General.Description: Visiativ SA engages in the innovation and digitalization businesses. The company offers transformational and cybersecurity diagnosis, PLM, sales force, workplace, merchandising animation plan, mobile sales, property management IWMS, risk management and insurance, myCAD, and LeClub software. In addition, it also provides solidworks, 3Dexperience, catia, simulia, delmia, and solidworks education, 3D CAD, search, inspection, MBD, electrical, simulation, flow simulation, plastics, visualize, and composer. It serves agrifood, finance, insurance, and real estate, manufacturing business, consumer goods, cosmetics, retail, health and pharmaceutical, transport and mobility, and teaching and research sectors. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Charbonnières-les-Bains, France.

1.Name: Mr. Christian  Donzel
1.Title: Co-Founder, Sr. Advisor of Visiativ & Director
